rules.natural: If a person owns furniture, then the furniture is functional.
Provided that a period occurs during restoration, if it is not the case that the furniture is functional, then the furniture is restored.
Whenever a period occurs after restoration, if the furniture is not functional, then the furniture is restored.
Supposing that furniture requires restoration, then either a period occurs during restoration or a period occurs after restoration.
In the event that a period occurs before restoration, the furniture is functional.
Given that a period occurs during restoration, the furniture is functional.
Provided that furniture is antique, it is collectible.
In cases where furniture is contemporary, it is not modern.
A person sells furniture or, if a person acquires furniture, then the person owns furniture.
A person acquires furniture or a person inherits furniture.
If a period occurs before sale, then if a person keeps furniture, it is not the case that the person sells furniture.
A period occurs before sale or a period occurs after sale.
Provided that a period occurs after sale, if a person keeps furniture, then the person does not sell furniture.
In the event that furniture is valuable, then either a person auctions furniture or a person purchases furniture or a person receives furniture.
Furniture is rare or furniture is historical.
Given that furniture is historical, it is valuable.
Supposing that furniture is authentic, then if it is rare, it is valuable.
Whenever furniture is structurally sound, it is not damaged.
If furniture is inspected, then it is structurally sound.
Provided that a person inherits furniture, the person owns furniture.

In cases where a period is scheduled for appraisal, if it is not the case that a period occurs before evaluation or a period occurs during restoration or a period occurs after restoration, then furniture has evaluation pending.
A period is scheduled for appraisal or a period is completed for appraisal.

Supposing that a period is completed for appraisal, then if it is not the case that a period occurs before evaluation or a period occurs during restoration or a period occurs after restoration, then furniture has evaluation pending.

Given that a period is planned for conservation, if it is not the case that a period occurs before conservation or a period occurs before restoration or a period occurs during restoration, then furniture needs conservation.
A period is planned for conservation or a period is completed for conservation.
Whenever a person purchases furniture, then if the person acquires furniture, the person owns furniture.

Provided that a period is completed for conservation, if it is not the case that a period occurs before conservation or a period occurs before restoration or a period occurs during restoration, then furniture needs conservation.
In the event that a person receives furniture, then if the person acquires furniture, the person owns furniture.
If furniture is damaged, then it is repaired.
If it is not the case that if furniture is antique then either a period occurs before restoration or a period occurs during restoration, then furniture is modern.
Supposing that it is not the case that if furniture is antique then either a period occurs before restoration or a period occurs during restoration, then furniture is contemporary.

Provided that it is not the case that a period occurs before evaluation or a period occurs during restoration or a period occurs after restoration, then it is not the case that furniture has evaluation pending.
In cases where it is not the case that if furniture is collectible then either a period occurs before restoration or a period occurs during restoration, then furniture is mass produced.

Supposing that it is not the case that a period occurs before conservation or a period occurs before restoration or a period occurs during restoration, then it is not the case that furniture needs conservation.
If it is not the case that a person purchases furniture or a person receives furniture, then a person steals furniture.
Provided that it is not the case that a person purchases furniture or a person receives furniture, then it is not the case that a person steals furniture.
In the event that it is not the case that if furniture is not inspected then it is not certified, then furniture is rejected.
If furniture is not inspected, then it is certified.
Supposing that furniture is not functional, then it is damaged.
